grammar_points.title: 礼貌用语
grammar_points.explanation: Xitoy tilida salomlashish, rahmat aytish va xayrlashish uchun ishlatiladigan asosiy iboralar

grammar_points.title: 敬称 '您'
grammar_points.explanation: '您' - ikkinchi shaxs olmoshi hurmat shakli. Kattalar yoki hurmatli kishilarga murojaat qilishda ishlatiladi.

grammar_points.title: 人称 olmoshlari
grammar_points.explanation: Asosiy shaxs olmoshlari

important_notes.title: So'z tartibi
important_notes.content: Xitoy tilida so'z tartibi odatda: Ega + Kesim + To'ldiruvchi

important_notes.title: Hurmat formasi
important_notes.content: Xitoy tilida hurmatni ifodalash muhim. Kattalar yoki o'qituvchilarga murojaat qilganda '您' ishlatiladi.

grammar_points.title: 基本 so'z tartibi
grammar_points.explanation: Xitoy tilida asosiy so'z tartibi: Ega - Kesim - To'ldiruvchi

grammar_points.title: '是' gap
grammar_points.explanation: '是' fe'li tenglik yoki mansublikni ifodalaydi. Inkori '不是'.

grammar_points.title: So'roq gapi
grammar_points.explanation: '什么' so'roq olmoshi 'nima' ma'nosida

important_notes.title: Xitoy ismlari
important_notes.content: Xitoy ismlari familiya + ism tartibida keladi. Masalan: 陈天中 (Chen - familiya, Tianzhong - ism)

important_notes.title: Uzr so'rash
important_notes.content: 对不起 - uzr so'rash, 没关系 - javob berish (hechqisi yo'q)

grammar_points.title: 结构助词 '的'
grammar_points.explanation: '的' egalik yoki aniqlovchini ifodalaydi. Ot oldidan keladi.

grammar_points.title: '吗' so'roq yuklamasi
grammar_points.explanation: '吗' gap oxirida qo'shib, so'roq gap yasaydi. Ha/yo'q javobini talab qiladi.

grammar_points.title: Millat ifodasi
grammar_points.explanation: Millatni aytish uchun: 是 + Davlat + 人

important_notes.title: Xitoy tili nomlari
important_notes.content: 中文 - xitoy tili (asosan yozma), 汉语 - xitoy tili (asosan og'zaki)

important_notes.title: Agar egalik munosabatida shaxs olmoshidan keyin qarindoshlik kelganda '的' tushib qolishi mumkin
important_notes.content: 我姐姐 (mening opam), 我老师 (mening o'qituvchim)

grammar_points.title: '有' gapi (1)
grammar_points.explanation: '有' fe'li ega bo'lish, borlikni ifodalaydi. Inkori '没有'.

grammar_points.title: Sonlar
grammar_points.explanation: 0-99 gacha sonlar

examples.original: 一 二 三 四 五
六 七 八 九 十
十一 二十 三十 九十九

grammar_points.title: '2' ning ikki xil shakli
grammar_points.explanation: 二 - tartib sonlarda, 两 - hisob so'z oldida

grammar_points.title: Hisob so'zlar
grammar_points.explanation: Xitoy tilida sonlardan keyin hisob so'z kelishi shart

grammar_points.title: Yosh so'rash
grammar_points.explanation: Kichik yoshdagilar uchun '几岁', kattalar uchun '多大' ishlatiladi

grammar_points.title: 语气助词 '呢' (1)
grammar_points.explanation: '呢' gap oxirida qo'shib, yuqoridagi holat haqida so'roq qilish

examples.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè háizi, nǐ ne?
Wǒ shì Zhōngguó rén, nǐ ne?

important_notes.title: Oila a'zolari
important_notes.content: 爸爸 (ota), 妈妈 (ona), 哥哥 (aka), 姐姐 (opa), 弟弟 (uka), 妹妹 (singil), 儿子 (o'g'il), 女儿 (qiz)

important_notes.title: 口 - oiladagi odamlar soni uchun hisob so'z
important_notes.content: 四口人 - to'rt kishilik oila

grammar_points.title: Vaqt ifodasi (1)
grammar_points.explanation: Sana va hafta kunlarini ifodalash tartibi: Yil -> Oy -> Kun -> Hafta kuni

examples.pinyin: èr líng èr wǔ nián wǔ yuè èrshí'èr hào

grammar_points.title: Oy nomlari
grammar_points.explanation: 1-12 oylar: 一月 (yanvar) - 十二月 (dekabr)

examples.original: 一月 二月 三月 四月
五月 六月 七月 八月
九月 十月 十一月 十二月

grammar_points.title: Hafta kunlari
grammar_points.explanation: 星期一 (dushanba) - 星期日/星期天 (yakshanba)

examples.original: 星期一 星期二 星期三 星期四
星期五 星期六 星期日/星期天

grammar_points.title: Ot-kesimli gaplar
grammar_points.explanation: Ot yoki otli birikma to'g'ridan-to'g'ri kesim vazifasini bajarishi mumkin (asosan vaqt, yosh haqida)

grammar_points.title: 能愿 fe'l '会'
grammar_points.explanation: '会' fe'l oldida qo'shib, biror narsani o'rganib, qila olishni ifodalaydi

important_notes.title: 号 va 日
important_notes.content: Kun (sana) uchun 号 (og'zaki) va 日 (rasmiy) ishlatiladi. Ikkalasi ham bir xil ma'noda.

grammar_points.title: 能愿 fe'l '想'
grammar_points.explanation: '想' fe'l oldida qo'shib, istak, niyatni ifodalaydi

grammar_points.title: Qo'shma fe'lli gaplar (1)
grammar_points.explanation: Ikki yoki undan ortiq fe'lli birikma gap kesimi vazifasini bajaradi. Maqsad yoki usulni ifodalaydi.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù chāoshì mǎi dōngxi

grammar_points.title: So'roq olmoshi '怎么'
grammar_points.explanation: '怎么' fe'l oldida qo'shib, usul yoki harakat tarzini so'raydi

important_notes.title: Telefon raqam so'rash
important_notes.content: 你的手机号是多少？ - Telefon raqamingiz necha?

grammar_points.title: Vaqt ifodasi (2)
grammar_points.explanation: Aniq vaqtni ifodalash: 点 (soat) + 分 (minut). 半 - yarim

grammar_points.title: Kun vaqti so'zlari
grammar_points.explanation: 早上 (erta tong), 上午 (tushgacha), 中午 (tush), 下午 (tushdan keyin), 晚上 (kechqurun)

grammar_points.title: 语气助词 '吧' (1)
grammar_points.explanation: '吧' gap oxirida qo'shib, taklif, maslahat, iltimosni ifodalaydi

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen xiàwǔ liǎng diǎn jiàn ba

grammar_points.title: 语气助词 '呢' (2)
grammar_points.explanation: '呢' gap oxirida qo'shib, tasdiqlangan faktni ifodalaydi

examples.original: 我明天下午两点还上课呢
examples.pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān xiàwǔ liǎng diǎn hái shàngkè ne
examples.translation: Ertaga tushdan keyin soat ikkida hali darsim bor

examples.pinyin: Lǐ Wén wǎnshang hái yǒu shì ne
examples.translation: Li Venning kechqurun hali ishi bor

grammar_points.title: Ravish va vaqt so'zlarining o'rni
grammar_points.explanation: Ravish va vaqt so'zlari fe'l yoki sifatdan oldin keladi

examples.pinyin: Tā shàngwǔ shí diǎn bàn shàngkè
examples.translation: U tushgacha soat 10:30 da darsga boradi

important_notes.title: 里 so'zi haqida
important_notes.content: 里 - ichida ma'nosida. '家' (uy) dan keyin kelganda neytral ohangda (li) o'qiladi. '里边' (ichida) so'zida uchinchi ohangda (lǐ) o'qiladi.

grammar_points.title: O'rin so'zlari
grammar_points.explanation: 上 (ustida), 下 (ostida), 里 (ichida), 外 (tashqarida), 前 (oldida), 后 (orqasida)

grammar_points.title: Ko'makchi '在'
grammar_points.explanation: '在' o'rin-joy so'zlari bilan birga kelib, qayerda nima qilishni ko'rsatadi

grammar_points.title: 能愿 fe'l '能'
grammar_points.explanation: '能' fe'l oldida qo'shib, qobiliyat, imkoniyat yoki shart-sharoitni ifodalaydi

examples.pinyin: Xiàwǔ liǎng diǎn nǐ néng dào ma?
examples.translation: Tushdan keyin soat ikkida yetib olasizmi?

examples.pinyin: Wǒ bù néng qù xuéxiào chī wǔfàn

important_notes.title: 小 + familiya
important_notes.content: 小 + familiya - o'zidan kichiklarga nisbatan mehr bilan murojaat qilish shakli. Masalan: 小胡 (Kichik Xu)

lessons.lesson_title: 我明天上午在学校学习

grammar_points.title: Mavjudlik gapi (1)
grammar_points.explanation: '有' yoki '是' yordamida biror joyda nima yoki kimning borligini ifodalaydi

examples.original: 学校前边有一家电影院
examples.pinyin: Xuéxiào qiánbian yǒu yī jiā diànyǐngyuàn

examples.original: 电影院前边是一家超市
examples.pinyin: Diànyǐngyuàn qiánbian shì yī jiā chāoshì

grammar_points.title: Vaqt va o'rin so'zlarining tartibi
grammar_points.explanation: Vaqt va o'rin birga qo'llanganda, vaqt o'rindan oldin keladi

examples.original: 我们七点在电影院外边见
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen qī diǎn zài diànyǐngyuàn wàibiān jiàn
examples.translation: Biz soat 7 da kinoteatr tashqarisida uchrashamiz

examples.original: 我明天上午在学校学习
examples.pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān shàngwǔ zài xuéxiào xuéxí

grammar_points.title: Tartib son '第'
grammar_points.explanation: '第' son oldida qo'shib, tartib son yasaydi

examples.original: 第一 第二 第三

important_notes.title: 边 so'zi haqida
important_notes.content: 边 qo'shimchasi o'rin so'zlariga qo'shiladi: 前边 (oldida), 后边 (orqasida). 边 neytral ohangda o'qiladi, alohida so'z sifatida 'bian' o'qiladi.

grammar_points.title: Pul miqdori ifodasi
grammar_points.explanation: RMB birliklari: 元/块 (yuan), 角/毛 (10 tiyin), 分 (tiyin). Tartib: 元/块 -> 角/毛 -> 分

grammar_points.title: Sifat-kesimli gaplar
grammar_points.explanation: Sifat to'g'ridan-to'g'ri kesim vazifasini bajarishi mumkin. Oldidan daraja ravishlari kelishi mumkin.

grammar_points.title: So'roq olmoshi '怎么样'
grammar_points.explanation: '怎么样' fikr so'rash, holat haqida so'rash uchun ishlatiladi

important_notes.title: RMB pul birliklari
important_notes.content: Rasmiy: 元 - 角 - 分. So'zlashuv tilida: 块 - 毛 - 分.

grammar_points.title: 正反 so'roq
grammar_points.explanation: Fe'l yoki sifatning ikki shaklini (iyobiy va inkor) qo'shib so'roq yasash: X + 不/没 + X

examples.pinyin: Tā shì bù shì zài chāoshì hòubiān?
Zhè jiàn yīfu hǎokàn bù hǎokàn?

grammar_points.title: Vaqt ravishlari '在/正在'
grammar_points.explanation: '在/正在' fe'l oldida qo'shib, harakatning davom etayotganligini bildiradi

examples.pinyin: Nǐ hái zài dú dàxué ma?

grammar_points.title: 能愿 fe'l '要'
grammar_points.explanation: '要' fe'l oldida qo'shib, istak, niyatni ifodalaydi

examples.pinyin: Tā jīntiān yào hé xiǎopéngyǒu wán

important_notes.title: Davomli harakat uchun uch xil shakl
important_notes.content: 1) 在/正在 + fe'l, 2) 在/正在 + fe'l + 呢, 3) fe'l + 呢. Inkor uchun 没(有) ishlatiladi.

grammar_points.title: Egasiz gaplar
grammar_points.explanation: So'z yoki birikmadan tashkil topgan, ega va kesimga ajratilmaydigan gaplar. So'zlashuvda ko'p ishlatiladi.

grammar_points.title: 语气 yuklamasi '了' (1)
grammar_points.explanation: '了' gap oxirida qo'shib, o'zgarish yoki yangi holat yuz berganini bildiradi

examples.pinyin: Shí'èr diǎn le, chī wǔfàn ba

grammar_points.title: '太……了' formati
grammar_points.explanation: Darajaning juda yuqori ekanligini ta'kidlash uchun ishlatiladi

important_notes.title: Kasal bo'lganda
important_notes.content: 生病了 (kasal bo'ldim), 看病 (shifokorga borish), 喝热水 (issiq suv ichish - xitoylar kasal bo'lganda issiq suv ichishni maslahat berishadi)

grammar_points.title: 能愿 fe'l '可以'
grammar_points.explanation: '可以' fe'l oldida qo'shib, imkoniyat, qobiliyat yoki ruxsatni ifodalaydi

examples.original: 我可以再问您一个问题吗？
examples.pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ zài wèn nín yī gè wèntí ma?
examples.translation: Sizdan yana bir savol so'rasam maylimi?

examples.pinyin: Nǐmen kěyǐ kàn zhè běn shū

grammar_points.title: 'Fe'l + 一下' strukturasi
grammar_points.explanation: Fe'lga 一下 qo'shib, harakatning qisqa muddatli yoki bir marta bajarilganligini bildiradi

examples.pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ dǎ diànhuà wèn yīxià

grammar_points.title: Ikki to'ldiruvchili gaplar (1)
grammar_points.explanation: Bir fe'l ikki to'ldiruvchi oladi. 给 (bermoq) va 问 (so'ramoq) fe'llari bilan

examples.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī bēi niúnǎi
Wǒ wèn lǎoshī liǎng gè wèntí

important_notes.title: Ovqat buyurtma qilish
important_notes.content: Restoran va kafelarda ovqat buyurtma qilish uchun: 我要... (men ... olaman), 请给我... (menga ... bering)

grammar_points.title: Aspekt yuklamasi '了' (2)
grammar_points.explanation: '了' fe'l dan keyin qo'shib, harakatning sodir bo'lgan yoki tugallanganligini bildiradi

examples.pinyin: Wǒ kàn le yī gè diànyǐng
Wǒ mǎi le yī gè xīn diànnǎo

examples.original: 我昨天没去商店买东西
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zuótiān méi qù shāngdiàn mǎi dōngxi

grammar_points.title: Ajraluvchi fe'llar (1)
grammar_points.explanation: 上课, 下课, 上班, 下班, 睡觉 kabi fe'llar ajralishi mumkin: orasiga boshqa so'z qo'shiladi

grammar_points.title: Doira ravishi '都'
grammar_points.explanation: '都' hamma, barcha ma'nosida. Umumlashtirilgan ob'ekt '都' dan oldin keladi.

important_notes.title: 他们, 她们, 它们
important_notes.content: 他们 - ular (erkaklar yoki aralash), 她们 - ular (faqat ayollar), 它们 - ular (narsalar). Uchchasi ham talaffuzi bir xil: tāmen

grammar_points.title: Biriktiruvchi qo'shma gap '……，还/也……'
grammar_points.explanation: Ikki yoki undan ortiq bog'liq gaplarni birlashtirish uchun ishlatiladi

examples.original: 我喜欢这个，也喜欢那个
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zhège, yě xǐhuān nàge
examples.translation: Men buni yoqtiraman, uni ham yoqtiraman

examples.original: 王老师是北京人，李文也是北京人
examples.pinyin: Wáng lǎoshī shì Běijīng rén, Lǐ Wén yě shì Běijīng rén
examples.translation: Van o'qituvchi pekinlik, Li Ven ham pekinlik

examples.original: 我喜欢喝中国茶，还喜欢吃中国菜
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān hē Zhōngguó chá, hái xǐhuān chī Zhōngguó cài
examples.translation: Men xitoy choyini ichishni yoqtiraman, xitoy taomlarini yeyishni ham yoqtiraman

important_notes.title: Xitoy taom madaniyati
important_notes.content: 多吃点儿 - ko'proq yeng (mehmondo'stlik ifodasi). Xitoylar mehmonlarga ko'proq ovqat taklif qilishadi.

important_notes.title: Pekin haqida
important_notes.content: 北京 - Xitoy poytaxti. 大兴机场 - Pekinning Daxing aeroporti, dunyodagi eng katta aeroportlardan biri.
